subject: Clean Hands
text:
Deeply troubled inside, 

I become silent

like a quiet, serene sea.

Impatience. It

has erupted again in my

hardened mood.

Playing a gamble

without a dice. An unmasked

body trembles.

I will ask my

river goddess one day―

where was my moon? 

Exploding in its

face, the enigma had never

any physical.

Making things easier for you.

I stand in the moment of truth

on flames.
